author: Sarah Young, Sarah Young
title: Clap for our Carers: Prince George, Charlotte and Louis join round of applause for NHS workers
description: Duke and Duchess of Cambridge's children dressed in NHS blue for the occasion
content:
The children of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge took part in the nationwide round of applause to thank the NHS for their work amid the coronavirus outbreak.
On Thursday evening, Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis helped lead the UKs Clap fo… [+1810 chars]
